Title: My Big Fat Greek Bob

Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Bob scores a temporary gig as a cook at an "underdog" frat house and discovers that he fits right in! Hijinks ensue as Bob and the rest of the fraternity brothers find themselves in the ...
